document_name: EG Phase II Prodoc Signed- 2SEP011 - Webversion.pdf

outputs.output_descr: The proposed project will address environmental governance issues by focusing on three interrelated outputs that will attempt to : (1) Streamlining and strengthening of Mongolia's environmental legislative framework; (2) Strengthening environmental ainstreaming mechanisms, and (3) Strengthening capacity of NGOs/CSOs to engage in environmental governance processes.

project_descr: The project aims to support the Government of Mongolia for streamlining environmental legislative framework
